radiographic_examinations.findings: Dense linear opacifications in the lung bases, left greater than right, likely reflecting atelectasis. The liver is homogeneous without discrete masses. The pancreas is atrophic. The kidneys contain multiple rounded hypodensities consistent with simple cysts. The appendix is dilated (1.1 cm) with hyperemic mucosa and surrounding inflammatory change suggesting microperforation. No free air; free fluid is noted. A large 1.5 cm diverticula is present in the sigmoid colon. Fat-containing inguinal hernia on the left. No lymphadenopathy or suspicious lesions.
